Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Wild Goat, Animal Chalice or Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: part of handle frill pattern.
Curator's comments: The handle frill pattern is found on Chian Wild Goat, Mature Animal Style and Grand Style chalices. The interior decoration does not provide any clues that could specify to which group the sherd belongs.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0360) (phase 2)
